name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ralph BYERS, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ralph BYERS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Murray B. Dolfman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Donna Zucker, Asst. Dist. Atty., Jeffrey Heilman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
564 A.2d 468
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ralph BYERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 14, 1989.
Decided Oct. 16, 1989.
Murray B. Dolfman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Donna Zucker, Asst. Dist. Atty., Jeffrey Heilman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
